name: Monster Mayhem (itch)
description:
Try to guide a rampaging monster to destroy as much of a randomly generated city as possible in the time limit. 

This is my submission for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. This is my first attempt at participating in any kind of game jam, and I think my submission is very reflective of my current skill level. Although, it only loosely fits the theme and I wasn't able to include many of the features I wanted, I managed to make an enjoyable experience that incorporates the majority of my programming and artistic knowledge.

I am especially proud of the goofy looking monster and the buildings to which it lays waste. I feel I'll be re-using the buildings, and my little brother cracks up every time the monster zips across the screen.
